byline.original: By PATRICIA COHEN; Compiled by DAVE ITZKOFF

snippet: A forged Robert Motherwell painting was branded with the equivalent of a scarlet letter on Tuesday in a legal settlement involving three art galleries and the Dedalus Foundation.
lead_paragraph: A forged Robert Motherwell painting was branded with the equivalent of a scarlet letter on Tuesday in a legal settlement involving three art galleries and the Dedalus Foundation.
